title: What happens if you miss Walmart orientation? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should be fired, cause, you didn’t have the Initiative, to cal your hiring Supervisor, in charge: that you over slept: may had gotten series ILL and so on, therefore. You failed your 1st Review! Your taught in HS to Perform. I’m Not being harsh; I once worked at a Busy Corp, back before the Covid was taught of & you had to call in if you’re running late.

If you were scheduled for orientation, you would have been actually hired prior to that day. Failing to show up for orientation made you a no call no show, which should make you ineligible for rehire. Your application shouldn't even be showing as 'active' in the HR system after a job offer was made.

They more then likely would not hire you because you not only lied on the application but you even showed them that you are not reliable however I have seen favoritism where they allowed the person to come after and be reschedule before
